package.description: This package is a wrapper on the svm_light library available from here. This package does not modify the contents of the original library in any manner and only wraps it for easy distribution with the ROS packaging system. svm_light is not under BSD license and is optional for FCL. Users can choose to use it by setting flag USE_SVM_LIGHT=1 in FCL.
